attributes.action: UK Government should not close the child refugee scheme after only 350 arrivals.
attributes.background:
We cannot turn our backs on these already traumatised children who are vulnerable to human trafficking, sexual exploitation, politicianry, violence and death.
We ask that the 'Dubs' amendment of allowing entry of 3,000 unaccompanied child refugees in the U.K. be upheld.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
